name: The Story of Goodness Online (Pre-Beta 3)
description:
Ho-ho-ho! Get ready for the first snowy release of TSOG Online! The Pre-Beta 3 version was recognized by the players as the most calming and fascinating atmosphere of TSOG Online ever! This release was the first step in the modernization of TSOG Online. In-game server hosting was removed and a dedicated server was added as a separate program. In this way, a multiplayer optimized 4 times compared to previous versions. 

Pre-Beta 3 is an outdated version that uploaded for nostalgia and fun purposes only. so there is no bug fixes for this version anymore. But the game server is active again, so It's possible to play with all TSOG Players around the world in a one public game together again just like the old days!
Check the latest TSOG Online here

All non original materials in Pre-Beta 3 belongs to their respective owners and no copyright infringement is intended.
